name: Fatty Beach
description:
This is a small game where the player walks through a beach filled with many characters, mainly larger women. This was done as a collab between myself, PrinceMatchacakes, and many other artists. 

!!!There are some known issues with audio and video being janky on some systems with weak or very busy CPUs. I am not sure why this is but download one of the attached versions for you OS if you get this. Also, the linux and iOS versions are not tested so let me know if there are any issues!!!

Controls:

  • WSAD - Move
  • Mouse - Look
  • R - reset position to start
